chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 Pro has the above problem:

When I call, my counterparts barely understand me or not at all and it's very difficult to phone.

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for repair the 30/05/2024. The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. Without answer with a valid tracking link before the 03/05/2024 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Olga from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue, and we do not have sufficient stock for an exchange. We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards, 
AS
